trans-unit.source: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en enkelt touch inndata som er generert av en finger på en berøringsskjerm.

trans-unit.source: You typically access a TouchDevice by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis få tilgang til en TouchDevice ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A TouchDevice represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: En TouchDevice representerer en enkelt berøring på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes flere finpussen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>til å skille mellom dem.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne klassen inneholder en arv behov på klassen nivået som gjelder for alle medlemmer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes når den utledede klassen ikke har tillatelse for fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om krav for sikkerhet, se [koblingen krav](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [arv krav](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Kalles fra konstruktører i avledede klasser initialisere den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the touch device.
trans-unit.target: En unik identifikator for berøring enheten.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> til inndataene meldingstjeneste system.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to activate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>må kalle denne metoden for å aktivere den gjeldende enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The device is already activated.
trans-unit.target: Enheten er allerede aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is added to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> legges til i inndataene meldingstjeneste system.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterer inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Kilden som rapporterer inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> capture mode.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en berøring til det angitte elementet ved hjelp av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref> capture modus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ikke kan hentes til et element hvis den allerede er lagret på et annet element.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: Elementet dekker berøring inndata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture berøring; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en berøring til det angitte elementet ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ikke kan hentes til et element hvis den allerede er lagret på et annet element.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch.
trans-unit.target: Elementet dekker ett trykk.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: Innhenting av policyen for å bruke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet kunne capture berøring; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet som fanget opp den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som fanget opp den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter capture-policyen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Innhenting av policyen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> fra inndataene meldingstjeneste system.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to deactivate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>må kalle denne metoden hvis du vil deaktivere den gjeldende enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised without the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår uten den tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: The device is not activated.
trans-unit.target: Enheten er ikke aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is removed from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> er fjernet fra inndataene meldingstjeneste system.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Henter element som berøring kontakte punktet direkte over.

trans-unit.source: The element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som berøring kontakte punktet direkte over.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns all touch points that are collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer alle berøringspunkt som er samlet inn mellom mest nylige og forrige touch hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som definerer koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: All touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: Alle berøringspunkt som ble samlet inn mellom mest nylige og forrige touch hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende posisjon for berøring-enheten i forhold til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som definerer koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering av berøring enheten i forhold til det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>, as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Henter den unike identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>, som leveres av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>representerer en enkelt berøring på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the Id property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes flere finpussen, kan du bruke egenskapen Id til å skille mellom dem.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the device is active.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om enheten er aktiv.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis enheten ikke er aktiv. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a touch is captured to an element.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en berøring fanges opp til et element.

trans-unit.source: The OnCapture method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCapture har ingen standard implementering.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when the touch input is captured.
trans-unit.target: Det kan overstyres i en avledet klasse til å utføre handlinger som er nødvendig når de berøring blir registrert.

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: Elementet dekker berøring inndata.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy.
trans-unit.target: Innhenting av policyen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en redigeringen er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>avbryte prosedyren. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en redigeringen er startet.

trans-unit.source: The OnManipulationStarted method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnManipulationStarted har ingen standard implementering.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when touch manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Det kan overstyres i en avledet klasse til å utføre handlinger som er nødvendig når berøring redigeringen er startet.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is pressed on an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterer at en berøring trykkes på et element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>må kalle denne metoden til å øke den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter> event is raised before the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>hendelsen starter før den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"> </xref> hendelsen ble håndtert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is moving across an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporter som en berøring går på tvers av et element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>må kalle denne metoden til å øke den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"> </xref> hendelsen ble håndtert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch was lifted from an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterer at en berøring ble lifted fra et element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>må kalle denne metoden til å øke den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised after the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"> </xref> hendelsen ble håndtert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterer inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source that reports input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Kilden som rapporterer inndata for denne enheten.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to synchronize the user interface with underlying touch points.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> for å synkronisere touch brukergrensesnittet med underliggende punkt.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing the user interface with the underlying touch positions might cause <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Synkronisering av brukergrensesnittet underliggende berøring posisjonen kan føre til at <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>hendelser til oppstå.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer posisjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet skal brukes som referansen for posisjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til det <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Henter den unike identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> som leveres av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en redigeringen er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>avbryte prosedyren. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet som mottar inndata fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som mottar inndata fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a touch message is sent.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en berøring meldingen sendes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
